entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers or thunderstorms. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Showers with a few thunderstorms ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Becoming cloudy late this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
